publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3471 Malcolm Chisholm: The Food Protection (Emergency Prohibitions) (Amnesic Shellfish Poisoning) (West Coast) (No.12) (Scotland) Order 2002â€”That the Health and Community Care Committee, in consideration of the Food Protection (Emergency Prohibitions) (Amnesic Shellfish Poisoning) (West Coast) (No.12) (Scotland) Order, recommends that the Order be approved.Supported by: Mr Frank McAveety*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*
